name: Pest Control
detailed_description:
Get ready to experience a game that hearkens back to the 8-bit classics found in arcades! Play as a persistent mushroom farmer who must avoid endless waves of giant alien bugs while collecting his crops. This farmer comes equipped with power-ups to destroy the bugs and bombs to clear the screen! Try your best to survive and get the highest score you can.

This game sports cute pixel graphics and radical sound effects that make you feel like you're in an arcade. Also featured in this game are some music tracks provided by the music producer Ozzed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
